expo.name: Habit Hero
expo.description: Build lasting habits with your personal AI coach. Track progress, get insights, and achieve your goals with Habit Hero's minimalist approach to habit formation.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Habit Hero uses the camera to let you take progress photos and visual reminders for your habits.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Habit Hero uses the microphone to record voice notes and audio reminders to help you track your habit progress.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Habit Hero needs access to your photo library to save and retrieve habit progress photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Habit Hero needs permission to save habit progress photos to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Habit Hero can sync with your calendar to help schedule habit reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Habit Hero can create reminders to help you stay on track with your habits.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Habit Hero can use your location to provide location-based habit reminders.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Habit Hero uses Face ID to secure your habit data and provide quick access to the app.
